items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 30 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 7!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 35 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 8!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 40 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 9!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 25 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 6!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 60 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 13.

items.checkin_comment: Dinner after seeing the Free Solo movie in Gettysburg.

items.badge_description: Raise a toast and give thanks to all who have bravely served around the world, past and present. Here's to you!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 5)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 6!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 25 distinct venues!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 35 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 8!

Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 5 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 15 different venues categorized as a Brewery. Visit 5 more different ones for Level 4!
Cheers to eight years of checking in beers! Thank you for continuing to discover, sip, and share with us!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 20 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 5!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 10 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 3.

You're getting the hang of it, but there’s much more to try. That’s over 50 unique brews!
